meanings.definition: A thick liquid or semi-solid substance used as a cosmetic or medicinal preparation.
meanings.sent1: She applied the creams to her face before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various creams for skincare.
meanings.sent3: The creams made her look like a shiny unicorn!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as creams on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The creams smelled like a field of flowers in bloom.

meanings.definition: To beat or whip (food) until it has a smooth, creamy consistency.
meanings.sent1: She creams the butter and sugar together for the cake.
meanings.sent2: The chef creams the ingredients to make a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent3: He creams the mixture with such enthusiasm, it's like a dance!
meanings.sent4: The waves creamed against the shore in a rhythmic pattern.
meanings.sent5: Creaming the batter slowly ensures a perfect texture.

meanings.definition: To defeat decisively in a game or competition.
meanings.sent1: The team creams their opponents in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She creams her rival in the chess tournament.
meanings.sent3: The cat creams the dog in the race, surprising everyone!
meanings.sent4: His argument creamed all the others in the debate.
meanings.sent5: The champion creams the competition with ease.
